name: Amanda Show Trivia Quiz | The Amanda Show | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the FIRST name of Amanda's character on the sketch "Moody's Point"?
questions.explanation:
Moody.

	There is also an Amanda Show book.

questions.text: What is the name of Amanda's number 1 fan?
questions.explanation:
Penelope Taynt.

	Penelope always works out schemes to meet Amanda.  They never work.

questions.text: What is the name of Penelope's brother?
questions.explanation:
Preston.

	Preston always asks his sister to get him a sandwich.

questions.text: Who is the judge that Amanda plays?
questions.explanation:
Judge Trudy.

	Judge Trudy doesn't like grown-ups.

questions.text: Where can you get the movie "Snowy Day"?
questions.explanation:
Blockblister.

	The owners are Blini, Blokey, and Biscotti.

questions.text: Who are the girls that do a show in the bathroom?
questions.explanation:
Sheila, Amber, Tammy, Debbie.

	Sheila has a bad attitude.  Amber is very popular.  Tammy is from Tennessee.  Debbie likes eggs.

questions.text: In what segment does someone tell a really weird story?
questions.explanation:
Totally Kyle.

	Kyle is played by Drake Bell.

questions.text: What is the color of the underpants that Amanda beats the boys with?
questions.explanation:
Pink.

	"Sorry boys, pink is for girls!"

Candy Tulips.

	Tony's sidekick's name is Pauly.

questions.text: What kind of food does Tony like?
